mapper.select: select nvl(count(*),0) from board where category = #{category}
select * from board where to_char(regdate, 'yyyymmdd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd')
mapper.update: update board set readcount=readcount + 1 where boardnum = #{boardnum}
mapper.select: select passwd from board where boardnum = #{boardnum}
select boardnum, category, userid, subject, content, thumb, filename, readcount, regdate, likecount from board where boardnum=#{boardnum}
mapper.insert: insert into likecheck(likenum, boardnum, userid, likecount) values ((select nvl(max(likenum), 0) + 1 as likenum from likecheck), #{boardnum}, #{userid}, 0)
